room_title: Escape room "The Green Room" by Lock & Clue Escape Rooms in Providence
review: Our team from work did the Green Room, we've never done anything like this before, and it was a blast. Their hints at the beginning really helped and they came in a couple of times to move us along out of an area we were stuck on. Everyone was able to participate and help out in the puzzle, such a great time! The staff was super friendly!

room_title: Escape room "The Green Room" by Lock & Clue Escape Rooms in Providence
review: This was great! The staff was friendly and enthusiastic. There were 4 of us and 4 random guests. All 8 of us worked together as a team and had a blast. We escaped the Green Room! Will definitely do it again. Looking forward to the next time already.

room_title: Escape room "The Green Room" by Lock & Clue Escape Rooms in Providence
review: I had an amazing experience tonight with my 3 cousins in "The Green Room". We escaped! We laughed and had so much fun figuring things out. The staff was inviting, friendly & fun!! Definitely going to be back!
